original_title: More Sri Lankans evacuated from Sudan
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A second batch of six Sri Lankans were evacuated from Sudan.
The group arrived at the King Faisal Naval Base in Jeddah on Friday (28).
Earlier this week, 13 Sri Lankans were evacuated from Khartoum with the assistance of the Saudi Government.
About 500 people have died in the crossfire, and over 4,200 people were injured, foreign media reports.
